text: Dariusz Podolski (born 17 June 1966) is a retired Polish football midfielder.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:ŁKS Łódź players Category:Zawisza Bydgoszcz players Category:Widzew Łódź players Category:Wisła Płock players Category:Hapoel Beit She'an F.C. players Category:Świt Nowy Dwór Mazowiecki players Category:Tur Turek players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Israel Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Israel
title: Dariusz Podolski
